name: Nausea & Motion Sickness
description: Feeling of sickness with an inclination to vomit. Can be caused by motion, pregnancy, digestive upset, or other factors.
approaches: Ginger in any form - tea, capsules, crystallized, or fresh
Small sips rather than large amounts
whenToSeek: Persistent vomiting, blood in vomit, signs of dehydration, severe abdominal pain, head injury
